headline.main: Art People; Bill of health for artists.

docs.lead_paragraph: FROM the anxiety front comes news that making art is at least as dangerous as eating, drinking and breathing. Creativity can, depending on its medium, lead to aplastic anemia, silicosis, cancer, various kinds of poisoning and lesser complaints.
